titleStmt.title: Articles for instruction of all the Viceadmiralles within the realme, howe to proceade for the preseruation of the quiet trade of all marchauntes and fysshermen, aswell strangers as Englyshe, resortyng to the seas for exercise of theyr lawfull trades
Proclamations.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Church yarde, by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Queenes Maistie,

notesStmt.note: Articles of instruction for viceadmirals within the realm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
